name: Sudha
content: With a Cibil score of 632, it was becoming near impossible to finance my education, until it was helped by EpiCred. Appreciate their efforts.

name: Annish Dsouza
content: Prabhnoor at EpiCred understood my financial situation efficiently. He is not just a consultant but also a great friend to the students.

name: Amarjeet Singh
content: My loan was sanctioned within 72 hours and I did not pay any extra fees to EpiCred in the process. I am really thankful for the help.
